meanings.definition: A type of bird native to New Zealand.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of huias in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The huias decided to have a singing competition.
meanings.sent4: The huias danced gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The huias' distinctive call echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'huia', referring to more than one of these birds.
meanings.sent1: Look at those huias perched on the tree.
meanings.sent3: The huias organized a picnic for all the forest birds.
meanings.sent4: The huias' unity was as strong as their beaks.
meanings.sent5: The huias' flight formation was a sight to behold.
